author: gdaniels
msg: Start roughing in ID/HREF support.  This likely will get a little complicated,
since we can easily imagine being in the midst of deserializing an element
when we find that we need another one by ID - so we'll then need to
record SAX events, popping out as far as we need to on the element
stack, until we hit the desired thing, then play back all the events we

author: gdaniels
msg: Don't need the DeserializationContext (for now) except at construction time.

author: gdaniels
msg: Use SOAPService rather than SimpleTargetedChain.  This cleans up the
code and does less registry lookups.
